name: Nostalgiwalk
description:
You decide to playtest  Nostalgiwalk - an upcoming walking-simulator-type game from a new indie studio. It seems like just the relaxing and chill game you've been looking for and you want to help the developers out in your own way.

What could go wrong?

Made for the Can You Jam 2021 online game jam in 48h on the theme:

"It's not a bug, it's a feature."

Please comment with your initial impressions and if you would like to see more of the story!

To be continued...
